name: spark-js-sdk-example
description: An example app for Cisco Spark's JavaScript SDK.
author: Asynchrony

scripts.start-dev: npm run build && npm run watch & node server.js
scripts.build: npm run build-js && npm run build-css && npm run build-html && npm run build-images && npm run build-fonts
scripts.watch: npm run watch-js & npm run watch-css
scripts.build-js: browserify js/index.js -o public/js/indexBundle.js & browserify js/login -o public/js/loginBundle.js
scripts.watch-js: watchify js/index.js -o public/js/indexBundle.js & watchify js/login -o public/js/loginBundle.js
